We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!The OpportunityThis is an exciting opportunity to join the Sales Operations & Enablement organization as we continue to shift to drive the business through data-based insights. This role involves a wide range of projects in support of key business decisions and fiscal results. The incumbent will design, develop and maintain analytical solutions and bring in thought leadership while dealing with complex business problems. The incumbent will have the opportunity to develop Business Cases that will have material impact on Sales performance and organization wide Growth and Retention metrics. Role involves partnering with geographically dispersed Sales, Operations, Finance and other Strategy & Ops colleagues to provide influential insights and recommendations to management.What you'll DoAs a BI Consultant, you'll be a core part of the Enterprise Sales Analytics team, driving analytics-based insights that informed decision making for our Sales Organization, and improve performance to drive revenue and retention goals. Listed here is a set of tasks expected from the incumbent. This list is however not exhaustive.Collect, analyze, and report sales performance.
Aggregate, summarize and interpret large data sets.
Communicate complex concepts and the insights of the analyses/models in a clear and effective manner to business and teammates.
Analyze current business processes and/or SOP’s and make recommendations for improvement to improve efficiency.
Perform gap analysis and prioritize areas for organizational performance improvement.
Ability to turn data into useful information through dashboards and reports.
Champion relationships with business teams by being proactive, display thorough understanding of the business processes and recommend innovative analytics driven solutions.
Develop framework for performance management across roles and functions.
Identify right business and product metrics to be analyzed and tracked for every feature/problem statement or in existing products.
Setup right analytical practices within the team, work with BI platform teams to design, build and deploy data analysis systems for large data sets.
Write compelling business cases by articulating business problems and translating them into analytical problem statement.
Work majorly in the IST 2PM - 11PM time zone and collaborate across various geographies.What you need to succeed2-6 years of work experience in the relevant field.
Bachelors (STEM) with Masters, MBA or equivalent in Analytics.
Hands-on experience in analyzing large datasets.
Expertise in data analysis tools / languages like MS Excel, T-SQL, Power BI, Python, R etc.
Proficient in Microsoft Office software.
Exceptional business communication skills verbal and written.
